pageContext.claim: “So we've placed massive tariffs on China, and the tariffs have really had a positive impact. Number one: our countries take it in a lot of money. Number two: we're creating jobs like never before.”
pageContext.analysis: In fact, trade and economic experts say Trump's tariff spree could end up costing U.S. jobs. The cost of tariffs is often passed onto consumers so ultimately it would be paid out of the pockets of American consumers. In effect, then, money would not be coming into the United States but would be a transfer from U.S. residents to the U.S. government.
